nodes.text: A grenadier was a specialized soldier who utilized grenades. During the Galactic Civil War at last two grenadiers served the Alliance to Restore the Republic, Yosh Calfor, a half-deaf soldier who joined the Rogue One team who traveled to Scarif to steal the Death Star plans, and Maximian Ajax, a rebel trooper in the Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry.
The grenadier first appeared in the 2015 mobile game Star Wars Rebels: Recon Missions.
